amendment.description: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to phase out tax preferences for fossil fuels on the same schedule as the phase out of the tax credits for wind facilities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3176, under the order of 2/2/16, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 50. Record Vote Number: 14.

action.text: Amendment SA 3176 proposed by Senator Schatz to Amendment SA 2953. (consideration: CR S474-475) To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to phase out tax preferences for fossil fuels on the same schedule as the phase out of the tax credits for wind facilities.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3176, under the order of 2/2/16, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 50. Record Vote Number: 14.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3176, under the order of 2/2/16, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 50. Record Vote Number: 14.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3176 proposed by Senator Schatz to Amendment SA 2953.
